locations.name: Palma, Mallorca
locations.description: The sophisticated capital of Mallorca, featuring a stunning Gothic cathedral and serving as a gateway to the Serra de Tramuntana mountains and charming port towns. Likely the main base for the Mallorca portion.

locations.name: Ibiza Town (Eivissa), Ibiza
locations.description: The main hub of Ibiza, known for its historic Dalt Vila (UNESCO site), bohemian markets, and proximity to both vibrant nightlife and secluded 'calas'. A likely base for exploring Ibiza.

locations.name: Formentera
locations.description: A tranquil island paradise south of Ibiza, renowned for its Caribbean-like white-sand beaches (like Ses Illetes) and crystal-clear waters. The coordinates point to Sant Francesc Xavier, the capital, representing the stay on the island.
